articles.author: Livemint
articles.title: Adani Group in talks with West Asian sovereign funds to raise $2.6 billion for airport, green hydrogen business | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Adani Group in talks with West Asian sovereign funds for $2.6B funding for airport and green hydrogen projects, aims for  ₹80,000 crore EBITDA by 2024.
articles.content: The Adani Group, an Indian conglomerate, is reportedly in advanced talks with sovereign funds in West Asia to raise up to $2.6 billion for its airport expansion and green hydrogen projects. The Adani… [+2202 chars]
